lines.text:
[horrified when hearing Janes husband approaching]
I thought you said you were separated!
He was away on business, that's separated isn't it?
What are you looking under the bed for?

[searching for a suspected philanderer]
That's where I always hide when I... Oh, never mind!
[after Jane grabs his ring and hides it down her blouse]
There must be way to get that ring and still avoid the censor.
